-Why do that? -It's not worth it! -I'm saving his life, okay? -Stupid!

translation.en: -You're gonna jeopardize everything! -[panting]
[John B] There's something about my father I haven't mentioned.
translation.it: C'è una cosa su mio padre che non ho detto.

translation.en: The week before he went missing, he says to me,
translation.it: La settimana prima di sparire, mi disse:

translation.en: "Bird, I think I found something.
Your Uncle T's gonna come stay for a while.
translation.it: Zio T verrà qui per un po',

translation.en: I might have to vanish for a bit."
translation.it: io dovrò sparire per un po'".

translation.en: So, he talks about vanishing,
and he vanishes.
Everyone says he was lost at sea, but...
translation.it: Tutti dicono che sia disperso in mare, ma...

translation.en: he's still out there. I know it.
translation.it: è ancora là fuori. Lo so.

translation.en: Get decent, sweetie. We need to talk.
Sorry to break in like this, but DCS called.
translation.it: Scusa se sono entrata così, ma hanno chiamato i servizi sociali.

translation.en: They wanted me to check on you. See how you're doin'.
translation.it: Volevano che venissi a vedere come stai.

translation.en: So, how are you, besides the--
Oh, no, I'm-- I'm great. Yeah, fantastic. Uh...
Thanks for comin' by.
I'm so glad to hear you say that, John B, but I heard a few things that worried me.
translation.it: Mi fa piacere, ma ho sentito delle cose che mi preoccupano.

translation.en: Let me see if I can remember.
Oh, yeah.
One of the things I heard was that your Uncle Teddy, your guardian,
translation.it: Una cosa è che tuo zio Teddy, il tuo tutore,

translation.en: hasn't been in the state for three months.
translation.it: non è nello Stato da tre mesi.

translation.en: -That's false. -You don't have to say anything.
translation.it: - È falso. - Non devi dire nulla.

translation.en: I know it's true. I called the school.
translation.it: So che è vero. Ho chiamato la scuola.

translation.en: They said you used to be a good student, but now you're failin' all your classes.
translation.it: Dicevano che eri un bravo studente, ma ora vai male in tutte le materie.

translation.en: No. No, I'm only failing one, and it's history. -He's a dick. He's out for me-- -[sheriff] I heard
translation.it: No, sto solo andando male in Storia. Il prof è stronzo. Ce l'ha con me.

translation.en: there was a fight on the beach yesterday,
translation.it: Ho sentito che ieri c'è stata una rissa sulla spiaggia,

translation.en: -and a gun was involved. -Okay. Gun?
translation.it: e che c'era una pistola. Dai. Una pistola?

translation.en: Did I get in a dustup? Yes, but was there a gun?
translation.it: Sono finito in una rissa? Sì. Ma c'era una pistola?

translation.en: [scoffs] No. No way.
[sheriff] That's okay. I know who it was. I'll get to him.
translation.it: Non fa niente. So chi era. Lo beccherò.

translation.en: All I'm worried about right now is makin' sure you're in a safe home.
translation.it: Ora mi preoccupa solo che tu sia in una casa sicura.

translation.en: [scoffs] Yeah, super safe. -Super sound, sturdy. You know? -[taps table]
translation.it: Sì, super sicura. Super solida e robusta, vedi?

translation.en: -Uncle T's coming, so... -[sheriff] That what he told you?
translation.it: - Zio T sta tornando, quindi... - Ti ha detto così?

translation.en: -Yeah. -[sheriff] If he is coming,
I think you should be allowed to stay.
Thank you.
But if I stick my neck out for you, you have to help me.
translation.it: Ma se mi metto in prima linea per te, tu devi aiutarmi.

translation.en: Tit for tat.
What-- what does tat mean?
Let me see, how can you help me? Oh, I know.
translation.it: Vediamo, come puoi aiutarmi? Ci sono.

translation.en: So, a body was found in the marsh yesterday.
translation.it: Ieri è stato trovato un cadavere nella palude.

translation.en: Were you in the marsh yesterday?
-Yeah, we were fishin' for some drum. -You catch anything?
translation.it: - Sì, a pesca di ombrine. - Ne avete prese?

translation.en: Nah, we were skunked.
[sheriff] Strange. Fishing's usually good after a storm.
translation.it: Strano. Di solito si pesca bene dopo una tempesta.

translation.en: All sorts of things get stirred up.
You come across a wreck yesterday?
You skimmin' just above the surface, John B.
translation.it: Sei appena sopra la superficie, John B.

translation.en: Now, down here is foster care, juvie.
Pretty big drop for a smart kid like you.
translation.it: Un bella caduta, per uno sveglio come te.

translation.en: Up here is you and your little friends doing whatever you want.
translation.it: Quassù, tu e i tuoi amichetti fate quello che volete.

translation.en: or foster care on the mainland.
You one inch above the surface, John B.
translation.it: Sei un centimetro sopra la superficie.

translation.en: If I was you, I'd start flappin' my wings.
translation.it: Se fossi in te, comincerei a sbattere le ali.

translation.en: Now, you sure you didn't come across a wreck yesterday?
translation.it: Sicuro di non aver visto un relitto ieri?

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, I'm sure.
It's better if you didn't, you understand?
translation.it: È meglio che tu non lo abbia visto, capito?

translation.en: I'm gonna look the other way, as long as you stay out of the marsh.
translation.it: Io chiuderò un occhio, purché tu stia lontano dalla palude.

translation.en: I got dogs livin' better than this, John B.
translation.it: Ci sono cani che vivono meglio di così.

translation.en: You might wanna think about cleanin' up.
[John B] Look, I'm callin' it off. All right?
Peterkin said, if I stay out of the marsh, she'll help me with DCS.
translation.it: Peterkin dice che se sto lontano dalla palude, mi aiuta coi sevizi sociali.

translation.en: -[JJ] And you believed her? -Yes, I believe her, JJ.
translation.it: E le hai creduto? Sì, le credo, JJ.

translation.en: An actual cop, John B. You believed a cop.
translation.it: Uno sbirro. Hai creduto a uno sbirro.

translation.en: All I gotta do is stay out of the marsh for a couple days, and she'll help me out.
translation.it: Devo solo stare fuori dalla palude un paio di giorni e lei mi aiuterà.

translation.en: It doesn't help that your ass was the one shooting a gun.
translation.it: Che tu avessi una pistola non aiuta.

translation.en: You know what I should have done? Just let Topper drown your ass.
translation.it: Dovevo lasciare che Topper ti annegasse.

translation.en: -[John B] Topper was gonna drown me? -[JJ] Sure looked like it.
translation.it: - Perché mi avrebbe annegato? - Sembrava proprio così.

translation.en: -[John B] Funny. -[JJ] Have you looked in a mirror?
translation.it: - Ti sei guardato allo specchio? - Vai. Dimmi.

translation.en: -[John B] Tell me some more. Come on. -They always win, don't they, man?
translation.it: - Ti sei guardato allo specchio? - Vai. Dimmi. Vincono sempre loro, no?

translation.en: Kooks versus Pogues. They always, always win!
translation.it: I Kook contro i Pogue. Vincono sempre!

translation.en: -Goddamn! -[Kie] Look, it's okay!
No, it's not okay!
It is not! They don't want us to go down into the marsh.
translation.it: Non va bene! Non ci vogliono nella palude.

translation.en: That means there's something valuable down there, and you know it.
translation.it: Significa che c'è qualcosa di valore, lo sai.

translation.en: I know you do. And I understand why you don't wanna go.
translation.it: So che lo sai. E capisco perché tu non vuoi venire.

translation.en: You're the golden boy. You got way too much to risk. And you--
translation.it: Sei il ragazzo prodigio. Hai troppo da perdere. E tu...

translation.en: I mean, you're already rich as fuck anyway.
Why would you bother?
But you and me, man, we got nothin' to lose!
translation.it: Ma io e te non abbiamo niente da perdere!

translation.en: -We really don't, all right? -JJ.
[JJ] And I know it didn't use to be that way for you.
translation.it: E so che non era così per te.

translation.en: I don't want to talk about this. I don't want to talk about it.
translation.it: Non voglio parlarne. Non ne voglio parlare.

translation.en: -[JJ] So that's it? -Just get out of my way, bro.
translation.it: - Allora è finita. - Togliti di mezzo.

translation.en: [JJ] John B, listen to me. I have a plan.
translation.it: John B, ascoltami. Ho un piano.

translation.en: You got the key to Cameron's big boat, right?
translation.it: Hai la chiave della barca di Cameron.

translation.en: -[John B] No. -There's scuba gear.
translation.it: - No. - Dove c'è la roba da sub.

translation.en: We borrow that, and then we go down to the wreck this afternoon,
translation.it: La prendiamo e andiamo al relitto oggi pomeriggio,

translation.en: and that is what's gonna save you, man.
translation.it: ed è questo che ti salverà.

translation.en: You don't see rich kids going into foster care, do you?
translation.it: Non danno ragazzi ricchi in affido, no?

translation.en: [John B] You know, I should have learned a long time ago to never listen to JJ.
translation.it: Avrei dovuto imparare molto tempo fa a non ascoltare JJ.

translation.en: He's full of bad ideas, like stealing from my rich boss.
translation.it: È pieno di brutte idee, come derubare il mio ricco capo,

translation.en: -But this time, he was right. -♪ Only dem alon invited ♪
-[John B] I had nothing to lose. -♪ Karina and Sabrina ♪
[John B] My dad said the island was America on steroids.
translation.it: Per mio padre l'isola è l'America sotto steroidi.

translation.en: The haves and have-nots like anyplace, but magnified and multiplied.
translation.it: I ricchi e i poveri qui sono amplificati e moltiplicati.

translation.en: The way I see it, the game's rigged. Maybe it always has been.
translation.it: Per me, il gioco è truccato. Forse lo è sempre stato.

translation.en: -No parents, money... -[Sarah] Cheers! ...and no one looking out for me,
translation.it: E senza genitori, soldi e nessuno che si curi di me,

translation.en: I got no chance...
-♪ Up inna har belly weh mi sen it ♪ -...unless I make it on my own.
translation.it: a meno che non me le crei.

translation.en: -♪ Me bad her up ♪ -Oh! Hey.
Are you stalking us? Plotting your revenge?
translation.it: Ci stalkeri? Trami la tua vendetta?

translation.en: Yeah. Why don't you just tell your daddy I blew the bilge on Druthers?
translation.it: Sì. Di' a tuo padre che ho fatto saltare la sentina di Druthers.

translation.en: Everything's good to go. Just toppin' off these tanks.
translation.it: È tutto pronto. Riempio solo le bombole.

translation.en: [Sarah] Hey, are you okay?
'Cause that eye of yours looks really gnarly.
translation.it: Perché il tuo occhio è messo proprio male.

translation.en: [John B] You know what?
You can tell Topper he won the first round. I'll get him next time.
translation.it: Di' a Topper che ha vinto il primo round. La prossima volta lo batto.

translation.en: So there's just gonna be a reign of terror on this island now?
translation.it: Quindi ora ci sarà un regime di terrore sull'isola?

translation.en: Wars have been started for less, Sarah Cameron.
translation.it: - Ci sono guerre iniziate per meno. - Ok.

translation.en: Okay. Can we drop the whole Pogues versus Kooks thing?
translation.it: - Ci sono guerre iniziate per meno. - Ok. Possiamo farla finita con la storia dei Pogue contro i Kook?

translation.en: It is really stupid.
You know, it's easy to say when you're a Kook.
translation.it: È facile da dire se sei una Kook.

translation.en: [deputy on megaphone] Are y'all ready for a water party today?
translation.it: Siete pronti per una festa sull'acqua?

translation.en: [chuckles] All right. Now, all kiddin' aside,
your job today is to help keep privates off the marsh
translation.it: oggi il vostro lavoro è tenere la gente lontana dalla palude,

translation.en: so we can do our job and find this wreck.
translation.it: così noi possiamo trovare il relitto.

translation.en: That's straight from Sheriff Peterkin.
Do not forget your sunscreen, ladies.
Bring a lot of liquids.
[woman] Does that include Natty Light?
I don't care what swill you bring. That's on your own recognizance.
translation.it: Non m'importa che birra portate. Lo fate di vostra iniziativa.

translation.en: All right. What else do you got to worry about? Let's go!
translation.it: Ok. Di cos'altro vi preoccupate? Andiamo!

translation.en: Pull that for me, will you? Thank you, ma'am.
Bill, I'mma get at ya about that tomorrow, all right?
translation.it: Bill, con te parlo domani, ok?

translation.en: -We're here about the missing boat. -Yeah?
translation.it: Scusi. Siamo qui per la barca scomparsa.

translation.en: -What can I do for you fellas? -Associates of the owner.
translation.it: - Che posso fare per voi? - Soci del proprietario.

translation.en: -Here to help however we can. -Uh-huh. Right.
We're devastated about Scooter. We just feel sick about it.
translation.it: Siamo sconvolti per Scooter. Stiamo malissimo.

translation.en: You mind if we join your armada? Take a look for ourselves?
translation.it: Le dispiace se ci uniamo alla sua flotta e diamo un'occhiata?

translation.en: Yeah, why not? Extra set of eyes.
translation.it: Sì, perché no? Sono degli occhi in più.

translation.en: We'll let you know if we find anything, Officer.
translation.it: Le faremo sapere se troviamo qualcosa.

translation.en: -You do that. -[engine starts]
-This is empty. You took empty tanks? -I...
translation.it: Questa è vuota. Hai preso delle bombole vuote?

translation.en: Okay, this one's a quarter full.
translation.it: Questa è piena per un quarto.

translation.en: It's enough for one of us.
Love it when a plan comes together.
Does anybody know how to dive?
-Anybody? -It's kind of a Kook sport.
translation.it: Nessuno? È uno sport da Kook.

translation.en: -[sighs] -I... read about it.
Great, Pope read about it, so someone's gonna die.
translation.it: Bene, Pope l'ha letto, qualcuno morirà.

translation.en: Look, y-you put the thing in your mouth and breathe. How hard could it be?
translation.it: Metti quel coso in bocca e respiri. Che ci vuole?

translation.en: If you come up too fast, nitrogen gets into your blood, and you get the bends.
translation.it: Se sali in fretta, l'azoto ti entra nel sangue e si formano le bolle.

translation.en: -Bends like, bend over and... -[Pope] The bends kill you.
translation.it: Come le bolle che faccio... Le bolle ti uccidono.

translation.en: -[JJ] Right. -I can-- I can dive.
-[JJ] You can dive. I'm cool with that. -[Kie] Since when can you dive?
translation.it: - Ok. A me sta bene. - Da quando lo sai fare?

translation.en: I'll do it. It's fine.
-Let me do some calculations real quick. -You serious?
translation.it: - Fammi fare due calcoli. - Dici sul serio?

translation.en: -[Pope] That boat's about 30 feet down. -Okay.
translation.it: La barca è a circa nove metri di profondità. Ok.

translation.en: [Pope] So it'll take 25 minutes at that depth.
Twenty-five.
Which means you need to make your safety stop at about... ten feet.
translation.it: Quindi devi fare una sosta di sicurezza a circa tre metri.

translation.en: All right? For two minutes.
[John B] Yeah, yeah. Ten feet, two minutes. Got it.
translation.it: Ok. Tre metri, due minuti. Capito.

translation.en: -Uh... -[Pope] What was that all about? I don't know, but I liked it. A lot.
translation.it: - Ma cosa fa? - Non lo so, ma mi è piaciuto molto.

translation.en: -[clears throat] -[JJ] Uh, so...
-[Pope] All righty. -Yeah. Uh, when you--
translation.it: Va bene. Quando sei giù, cerca la stiva.

translation.en: uh, when you're down there, you look for the cargo hold.
translation.it: Quando sei giù, cerca la stiva.

translation.en: You stick this thing inside and twist and pull, okay?
translation.it: Infila questa cosa, gira e tira, ok?

translation.en: -[John B] Stick in, twist, pull. -[JJ] Yeah.
translation.it: - La infilo, giro e tiro. - Sì.

translation.en: -My dad moved weight back in the day. -[Pope] Who didn't?
translation.it: - Mio padre era del mestiere. - Ovvio.

translation.en: Hey! I tied my T-shirt to the anchor chain about ten feet down.
translation.it: Ho legato la maglietta alla catena dell'ancora a circa tre metri.

translation.en: It's where you need to do your safety stop.
translation.it: È lì che devi fare la sosta.

translation.en: -[John B] Cool. -[Pope] Keep an eye on this.
You need to make sure you have enough air to decompress.
translation.it: Devi avere abbastanza aria per la decompressione.

translation.en: Okay, how much do I need?
Unclear. Breathe as little as possible.
translation.it: Non è chiaro. Respira il meno possibile.

translation.en: Zen. Think Zen, you know?
-[imitates breathing through mask] -[John B] Yeah. Got it.
[Pope] Hey, if we get caught in the marsh,
translation.it: Se ci beccano qui nella palude, siamo fottuti.

translation.en: we're basically screwed, so...
translation.it: Se ci beccano qui nella palude, siamo fottuti. Meglio darci una mossa.

translation.en: -better get a move on. -[John B] Copy that.
Diver down?
Diver down.
[Pope] Diver down.
-All right. -[JJ] See ya, dude.
Shit. JJ.
Guys, that's the police.
Oh, you gotta be kidding me.
-[JJ] Yep, that's the police. -Just act frickin' normal.
translation.it: Sì, è la polizia. Comportatevi normalmente.

translation.en: -Evening, officers. -Evening.
-[officer] Here. -[deputy] Evening.
[Pope] JJ, tie it off.
How you kids doing? You know the marsh is closed?
translation.it: Cosa fate? Sapete che la palude è chiusa?

translation.en: -No. -No. Wow.
translation.it: - No, cavolo. - No, non lo sapevo.

translation.en: -I didn't know that. -Why-- why is it closed?
translation.it: - No, cavolo. - No, non lo sapevo. Perché è chiusa?

translation.en: Well, we're conducting a search out here. Boat went down.
-Oh. -[deputy] Seen anything?
-[JJ] No. -No boats. No.
translation.it: - Avete visto qualcosa? - No. Nessuna barca. No.

translation.en: Where's your friend you always hang with? He here?
translation.it: Dov'è il vostro amico che è sempre con voi? È qui?

translation.en: He's working.
I'm gonna check your little boat out.
-[JJ] Yeah. -[Pope] Yeah, hop aboard.
-You wanna check-- uh, check her out. -Thank you.
-[deputy] Uh... you got another one? -[JJ] Yeah.
translation.it: - Ce n'è un altro? - Sì, certo.

translation.en: -[Pope] Yeah, yeah. -Of course. It's, uh... it's in the hold.
translation.it: - Ce n'è un altro? - Sì, certo. È nella stiva.

translation.en: -[Pope] Yeah. -Show him.
Yeah, here we go.
-All right. -[JJ] Yeah.
-[Pope] Uh... -[JJ] Be careful. [Pope] Be careful. You don't wanna slip.
All right.
-All right. -All right.
-[deputy] Beautiful day. -[JJ] Sure is.
-[Pope] Very. -[deputy] Let us know
translation.it: Bellissima. Fateci sapere se vedete qualcosa quando andate via.

translation.en: if you see anything on your way out.
translation.it: Fateci sapere se vedete qualcosa quando andate via.

translation.en: -Will do. Will do. -[engine starts]
-[JJ] We'll be gone soon, sir. -[deputy] Yes, you will.
[Pope] He's definitely out of air.
-[JJ] There he is! -Oh, God! Jesus Christ!
-Don't scare us like that! -[JJ] How'd it go down there?
translation.it: - Non spaventarci così! - Com'è andata giù?

translation.en: Did you find anything?
Did I find anything?
[JJ] Yeah, there we go! That's my boy!
[Pope] Jeez, dude!
-Dude! -Oh!
-[Kie] You okay? -[panting] Yeah, I ran out of air.
translation.it: Stai bene? Sì, solo senza aria.

translation.en: You scared the shit out of me.
Yeah, the cops were up here, but, uh... took care of 'em.
translation.it: È venuta la polizia, ma ci ho pensato io.

translation.en: -[John B] My bad. -[Pope] You're all good.
[JJ] Yeah, you kinda missed the show, brother.
-Hey, guys? Guys, bogey, two o'clock. -What?
translation.it: Ehi, ragazzi. - Barca a ore due. - Cosa?

translation.en: -[Pope] Do you recognize that boat? -[Kie] I've never seen it.
translation.it: - La riconoscete? - Non l'ho mai vista.

translation.en: What are they doing here? The marsh is closed.
translation.it: Che fanno là? La palude è chiusa.

translation.en: [JJ] Let's not stick around and find out.
translation.it: Non so, ma non restiamo per scoprirlo.

translation.en: -JJ, get the bowline. -[JJ] Yeah.
-Should we wait on 'em? -[John B] No, we're not.
-Go get the stern. Go! -[Kie] Are you joking? JJ, hurry up.
translation.it: - Prendi l'ancora. Vai! - Scherzi? JJ, sbrigati.

translation.en: -[JJ] Guys, don't wait for me. Go. -[Kie] Let's go!
[Pope] Pull out the stern.
-I don't like this. -[JJ] Are they coming for us?
translation.it: - Non mi piace la cosa. - Ci seguono?

translation.en: [Pope] Maybe they're fishing.
-[JJ] Go, go, go, go! -[Pope] Go into the marsh.
-[Kie] Let's go! -[John B] I'm going. Act natural.
translation.it: - Andiamo! - Vado. Fate finta di niente.

translation.en: [Kie] Hey, guys, they're following us.
-[Pope] This can't be good. -Shit.
[JJ] Dude, you gotta go faster!
-I'm going! -Gun it!
-[Pope] What the... -[Kie] Holy shit!
[JJ] John B, get down!
[Pope] We're gonna die!
Shit! Pope, move.
-[Kie yells] -Get down, Kie!
-Oh, my God! Whoo! -[Kie] Whew!
[JJ] Booyeah! Pogue god, man!
-See you, guys! -[Kie] That was insane!
[Kie] Oh, God.
-What do you think it is? -[John B] Gotta be money, right?
translation.it: - Cosa ci sarà? - Tipo dei soldi, no?

translation.en: That or a couple of keys with street value to the low- to mid-mils!
translation.it: O delle chiavi di ville da qualche milioncino!

translation.en: -[Pope] Can we please just open the bag? -[John B] Wow, Pope.
translation.it: Possiamo aprire la borsa? Wow, Pope.

translation.en: That's a rare outburst of emotion.
translation.it: Un raro scoppio emotivo, il tuo.

translation.en: Okay. You guys are literally killing me with anticipation.
translation.it: Mi state uccidendo con questa attesa.

translation.en: -Open the bag. -[JJ] Jeez.
[Pope] We almost died over this.
[Pope] Oh, wow. Yup. That's about right.
Good job, everybody. We found a compass.
Dude, what? It's not worth anything.
This was my father's.
